snippet: Organizers of the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro said a sailing competition that was the first test event for the Games was “a great success.”
abstract: Organizers of 2016 Olympics call sailing test in Rio de Janeiro a success.
lead_paragraph: Organizers of the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro said a sailing competition that was the first test event for the Games was “a great success.”

headline.main: Officials Call Sailing Test in Rio a Success
headline.print_headline: Officials Call Sailing Test in Rio a Success
